question: Is it allowed to hold the Qura'an in my hands and read from it in any nafal prayer?
answer:
QUESTION
Is it allowed to hold the Qura'an in my hands and read from it in any nafal prayer?
ANSWER


Share:
According to the Hanafi Madhab, it is Makrooh to hold the Qur?aan in any Salaat including Nafl Salaat and read from the Qur?aan. (Fataawa Hindiyyah, Raddul Muhtaar, Fataawa Rahimiyyah vol.9 pg.288-289, Maraaqiul Falah pg.187)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
